title: I did not get the new Icon but my mission was cleared!
body: I cleared the mission but did not get the icon that I need to clear other missions and get tickets!

replies.body: Turns out there was a bit of a glitch in the battle boss matrix, and some of those icons didn't get sent out like they were supposed to. It looks like most have been sent finally, but please let me know if you still don't have yours!
Thank you kind sir! :) I got my icon

Hi Broporo,

I didn't receive my icon either, any chance you could help me out?
